Fayetteville.Westlawn (Fayetteville, North Carolina): Westlawn is a historic home located at Fayetteville, Cumberland County, North Carolina. It was built in 1858, and is a two-story, five bay, frame dwelling with a double-pile center-hall plan in the Greek Revival style. It features a one-story, hip roofed porch supported by Doric order columns.
